additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, 25% Juice from Concentrates (13% Lemon, 12% Lime), Natural Flavours, Food Acids (Malic, Citric, Sodium Citrate), Natural Sweeteners (Monk Fruit & Stevia extract), Natural colours (Vegetable & Plant extracts), Xanthan gum, Preservative (223,202).

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: Made in Australia from local and imported ingredients

description: A familiar lemonade taste coupled with distinct lime notes and finished with a delicate blend of bitters, herbs and spice. Crafted to perfection to deliver wondrous flavour without added sugar.
name: Diet Lemon Lime & Bitters Cordial
